name: Deep Rock Galactic Save Syncer
description: Deep Rock Galactic (DRG) is an excellent co-op survival game, however it's got a major flaw: the game isn't cross platform. This makes it hard to play with friends who aren't on the same platform.
Thus Deep Rock Galactic Save Syncer (DRGSS) was born! DRGSS is a user friendly desktop app that lets you sync your save files between Steam and Xbox installations of DRG without any fuss!

Designed to be as easy to use as possible, DRGSS provides a single click solution to get save files synced up between the platforms, while being transparent and fault tolerant to keep those precious save files safe.
The UI for Deep Rock Galactic Save Syncer, designed it to be as simple to use as possible.
Note that it's instantly ready to sync your save files with a single click of that big button at the bottom!
